response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe this product would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We understand the product's worth to you is $800,000, but we hope this price aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction and excellent customer service throughout the process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
